translation.en: ♪ Vacation, all I ever wanted ♪ Okay. All right, one, two, three...
Guys! One...
Hold on. Guys, freeze!
ALVIN: Hey, Dave. Where's Alvin?
Where have you been? Where have I been?
Trying to board the ship.
Already done that. Also, checked out our room,
translation.it: Già fatto. Ho anche verificato la stanza,

translation.en: dibbed the side of the bed closest to the window,
translation.it: scelto il letto vicino alla finestra,

translation.en: ordered us a round of virgin pina coladas
translation.it: ordinato un giro di piña colada analcoliche

translation.en: and signed us up for parasailing.
translation.it: e prenotato un giro col paracadute ascensionale.

translation.en: Alvin, you're too young for parasailing.
translation.it: Alvin, sei troppo piccolo per quello.

translation.en: I thought we were going on vacation to have fun.
translation.it: Credevo dovessimo divertirci in questa vacanza.

translation.en: Don't worry, family vacations are all about fun.
translation.it: Tranquillo. Le vacanze in famiglia servono a quello.

translation.en: But first we're gonna need to set some rules.
translation.it: Ma prima bisogna stabilire alcune regole.

translation.en: Let's start with you can't call dibs on a bed until everyone's in the room.
translation.it: Tipo: vietato scegliere il letto se non si è tutti in camera.

translation.en: That's right. ELEANOR: Good rule.
That's a good one, Simon. All right, so that's our first rule.
translation.it: Ottima idea, Simon. Questa è la prima regola.

translation.en: Should we go over the rest of them?
Dave, come on. "Rules" is my middle name.
translation.it: Avanti, Dave. "Regole" è il mio secondo nome.

translation.en: Alvin! Hey, Dave.
This is your captain speaking.
translation.it: È il comandante che vi parla.

translation.en: All kids are now allowed to play on the adults-only Serenity Deck.
translation.it: Tutti i bambini possono giocare sul Ponte Relax riservato agli adulti.

translation.en: (GRUNTING)
translation.it: PER RAGIONI DI SICUREZZA BISOGNA ESSERE ALTI COSÌ

translation.en: We talked about setting rules, Alvin. I'm sorry.
translation.it: -Non avevamo parlato di regole, Alvin? -Mi dispiace.

translation.en: I didn't know the agreement meant no fun.
translation.it: Non credevo che fosse vietato divertirsi.

translation.en: You're allowed to have fun.
When are you going to stop acting like a child?
When are you going to stop treating me like a child?
translation.it: Quando la smetterai di trattarmi come un bambino.

translation.en: I'll stop treating you like a child when you start acting like a grown-up!
translation.it: La smetterò quando ti comporterai da adulto!

translation.en: I'll start acting like a grown-up when you start...
translation.it: E io mi comporterò da adulto quando tu...

translation.en: CHIPETTES: Aw. Hey, girls, not now, please, okay?
SIMON: Sorry, Dave. ALVIN: Lame!
I need to get ready for dinner with the captain.
translation.it: Devo prepararmi per la cena col comandante.

translation.en: (GASPS) We're having dinner with the captain?
No, I am. You're staying here.
translation.it: No. Io cenerò col comandante. Voi starete qui.

translation.en: I have to go apologize for everything Alvin did.
translation.it: Voglio scusarmi per il comportamento di Alvin.

translation.en: This is so not fair. Not to us, not to Dave,
translation.it: Non è giusto. Non è giusto per noi, per Dave

translation.en: and certainly not to the captain,
translation.it: e di certo per il comandante,

translation.en: who I'm sure was really looking forward to dining with me.
translation.it: che non vedeva l'ora di cenare con me.

translation.en: Why don't I go speak with Dave? See if I can smooth things over.
translation.it: Potrei parlare con Dave e cercare di aggiustare le cose.

translation.en: SIMON: Knock-knock.
What is it, Simon? Well, I would never say this to Alvin.
translation.it: -Che c'è, Simon? -Be', non lo direi mai ad Alvin.

translation.en: Goodness knows he can be totally irresponsible,
translation.it: Dio solo sa quanto è irresponsabile a volte,

translation.en: but I actually have a suggestion.
You have a suggestion for me?
He's been driving me crazy a lot longer than he's been driving you crazy.
translation.it: Fa infuriare me da molto più tempo.

translation.en: All right. So what is it?
Imagine Alvin is a spirited racehorse.
translation.it: Immagina Alvin come un impetuoso cavallo da corsa.

translation.en: That's your advice?
No. I'm not done yet, Dave.
All right, so Alvin is a racehorse...
translation.it: Alvin è un cavallo da corsa...

translation.en: And you, Dave, are his incredibly helpful jockey
translation.it: E tu, Dave, sei il fantino

translation.en: who's there to guide him down the racetrack of life.
translation.it: che deve guidarlo lungo l'ippodromo della vita.

translation.en: But if you hold the reins too tight,
that racehorse is going to fight and buck,
translation.it: il cavallo si ribellerà e ti disarcionerà

translation.en: which is no fun for anyone.
But if you loosen the reins just a little...
translation.it: Ma se allenti un po' le redini...

translation.en: He'll fly right off the track and crash into the fence.
translation.it: Finirà fuori pista e si schianterà contro lo steccato.

translation.en: I know you want to protect Alvin,
but, Dave, sometimes kids will rise to the occasion
if you just show them a little trust.
translation.it: se gli dessi un po' di fiducia.

translation.en: All right, guys, room service is on its way. Lights out by 9:00.
translation.it: Bene. Il servizio in camera sta per arrivare. Tutti a nanna alle 21:00.

translation.en: Dave, question.
If we're going to be held captive in this room...
translation.it: Visto che siamo prigionieri in questa stanza...

translation.en: Because of Alvin!
Can we at least watch a movie?
All right, let's see what's on.
You know what, why don't you guys pick a movie?
You're old enough to make your own decision.
For real, Dave?
Absolutely.
Ooh! Dave looks so elegant. Have fun!
Wait, Dave, before you go, I made something for you.
translation.it: Dave, aspetta. Prima che tu vada, ti ho fatto una cosa.

translation.en: Wow, it's really...
It's soft so you can sleep in it
and I made it with all the colors, so it will go with everything!
translation.it: e ho usato tutti i colori, così sta bene con tutto!

translation.en: Great. I'll put it on after dinner.
You could put it on now, so everyone at the captain's table could see it.
translation.it: Potresti metterla ora, così la vedranno tutti.

translation.en: ALVIN: (LAUGHING) Nice.
A real chick magnet.
All right, guys, have fun.
But not too much fun, because I'm still very upset.
translation.it: Ma non troppo. Sono ancora arrabbiato.

translation.en: Goodbye, Dave.
And, hello, ladies!
(MIMICKING SEAN CONNERY) I like my tail shaken, not stirred.
translation.it: Mai dire mai all'agente Alvin Bond.

translation.en: Where are you going? To the casino. I'm feeling lucky.
translation.it: -Dove stai andando? -Al casinò. Mi sento fortunato.

translation.en: Oh, no. No, no, no, no. Dave said...
translation.it: Oh, no. No, no, no. Dave ha detto...

translation.en: Dave said, and I quote, (CLEARS THROAT)
"We're old enough to make our own decisions."
He meant we were old enough to choose a film!
Well, we're clearly not. Check out what Theodore just picked.
translation.it: Be', direi che si sbagliava. Guarda che film ha scelto Theodore!

translation.en: What's wrong with this movie?
translation.it: Cos'ha che non va questo film?

translation.en: It's for babies!
Which is probably why Dave treats us like babies.
translation.it: Ed è per questo che Dave ci tratta come tali.

translation.en: Munk up, Theodore.
There. That's more like it.
Alvin, please!
I say we go to Salsa Night!
translation.it: Io dico di andare alla "Serata Salsa".

translation.en: In our pajamas?
Oh, I know!
And we have a winner.
Ellie, I love these dresses!
You're so crafty.
Thanks. It's what I do.
Ow! Oh! Sorry! Ew! What are you?
(LAUGHS) We are the Chipettes. Hi, I'm Eleanor!
translation.it: -Noi siamo le Chipette. -Ciao, io sono Eleanor!

translation.en: My sister was just trying to apologize.
translation.it: Mia sorella stava cercando di scusarsi.

translation.en: What's she sorry for? Stepping on my friend's foot?
translation.it: Perché è salita sul piede della mia amica?

translation.en: Or her busted, tired little dance moves?
translation.it: O per via delle sue pessime mosse?

translation.en: Oh, no, you didn't!
Oh, yes, she did!
You better get those Lee Press-Ons out of my face
translation.it: Meglio se togli quelle unghie finte dalla mia faccia

translation.en: unless you want to meet my claws.
translation.it: o dovrai affrontare i miei artigli.

translation.en: And, yeah, baby, they're real.
Hit it! Do you wanna go?
DAVE: Captain, I'm really sorry about what happened.
translation.it: Comandante, mi spiace per quanto è accaduto.

translation.en: Alvin, he's a kid. He's just trying to have some fun.
translation.it: Alvin è ancora piccolo. Voleva solo divertirsi.

translation.en: There's nothing wrong with fun.
Our pelican makes sure that everybody on the ship has fun.
translation.it: Il nostro pellicano si assicura che tutti si divertano.

translation.en: In fact, in port, he circles the ship on a hang glider.
translation.it: Quando siamo attraccati, sorvola la nave in deltaplano.

translation.en: It's really quite amusing.
However, my number one priority is the passengers' safety.
translation.it: Ad ogni modo, la sicurezza dei passeggeri è una priorità.

translation.en: So I simply cannot have Alvin put himself, or anyone else, at risk again.
translation.it: Non posso permettere che Alvin o chiunque altro corra dei rischi.

translation.en: Believe me, I understand.
If Alvin breaks any more of our rules, there will be consequences.
translation.it: Se Alvin infrangerà un'altra regola, prenderò provvedimenti.

translation.en: The last thing we want is anyone getting hurt.
translation.it: Non vogliamo che qualcuno si faccia male.

translation.en: Excuse me.
Hot! WAITER: Sorry.
Hot!
Unbelievable. Gravy pants.
Hey, hey!
Do you have a problem with me? You bet I have a problem with you.
Why? As if you didn't know.
I don't know.
Ian? What are you doing here?
I'm working, Dave.
This is your job?
Yeah, not too many record labels are interested in hiring the guy
translation.it: Sì. Non molte etichette discografiche vogliono assumere

translation.en: who blew it with the Chipmunks, blew it with the Chipettes
translation.it: chi ha fallito con i Chipmunk e le Chipette

translation.en: and passed on Justin Bieber.
Twice.
Look, Ian, I'm sorry you lost your job and your dignity.
translation.it: Ascolta, Ian. Mi dispiace che tu abbia perso lavoro e dignità.

translation.en: But spilling things, hot things, on me
isn't going to bring any of that stuff back.
translation.it: non ti restituirà ciò che avevi.

translation.en: You're right, Dave. It's too late for me to get my old life back.
translation.it: Hai ragione, Dave. Non posso riavere la mia vecchia vita.

translation.en: But it's not too late to ruin yours.
translation.it: Ma posso ancora rovinare la tua.

translation.en: You want to ruin my life?
Why don't we just start with this vacation?
If I see those chipmunks break so much as one rule,
translation.it: Se vedrò i Chipmunk infrangere un'altra regola,

translation.en: I'm going straight to Captain Correlli.
You're in my house now!
Although, technically it's not a house, it's a ship.
translation.it: Anche se tecnicamente non è un territorio, ma una nave.

translation.en: The point is, I'll be watching you.
translation.it: Il punto è che vi terrò d'occhio.

translation.en: Like a hawk!
Theodore? Please don't eat my brain!
Why are you watching Jungle Monster 4?
translation.it: Perché stai guardando Il mostro della giungla 4?

translation.en: Alvin, how could you...
Girls?
Oh, no. No, no, no, no, no, no, no!
(GASPS) I'll be right back!
It's dark. (DOOR SHUTS)
You're up for an International Music Award. That's fantastic!
translation.it: Hai una nomination agli International Music Award. Fantastico!

translation.en: Yeah, it's pretty cool.
I guess. If you like a lot of adulation.
translation.it: O almeno credo. Se ami essere al centro dell'attenzione.

translation.en: We fly there right after the cruise. Hoping to take home Record of the Year.
translation.it: Ci andremo dopo questa crociera. Vorrei vincere per il miglior disco dell'anno.

translation.en: That would make you the youngest winner ever.
translation.it: Saresti il più giovane a esserti aggiudicato quel premio.

translation.en: I'm not that young.
I mean, I'm hanging out in a casino way past my bedtime.
translation.it: Sono in questo casinò e l'ora della nanna è passata da un po'.

translation.en: Not that I have a bedtime! (LAUGHS NERVOUSLY)
translation.it: Non che io abbia un orario per andare a nanna!

translation.en: No one tells me what to do.
translation.it: Nessuno mi dice cosa devo fare.

translation.en: DAVE: Alvin!
Who's Alan, I wonder?
Anyway.
I'd love to chat more, but I've gotta run.
translation.it: vorrei chiacchierare ancora un po', ma devo scappare.

translation.en: You're in a lot of trouble, young man!
ALVIN: You can follow me on Critter!
I wasn't betting. Honest.
Your winnings, sir.
Oh, busted!
I didn't sneak out. I mean, I did. But only to stop Alvin.
translation.it: Non sono scappato. Cioè, l'ho fatto. Ma per fermare Alvin.

translation.en: Right. IAN: There they are, Captain.
Captain.
ALVIN: What's he going to do, make us walk the plank?
translation.it: Cosa può fare? Buttarci a mare?

translation.en: (GASPS) There's a plank?
No, there's no plank, but if you guys disobey me one more time,
translation.it: No, tranquillo, ma se mi disubbidirete ancora una volta

translation.en: you will be off the ship.
And you'll miss the International Music Awards. Do you understand?
translation.it: E addio International Music Award. Capito?

translation.en: Yes, Dave. Uh-huh.
Absolutely.
What if we need to disobey you?
translation.it: E se fossimo costretti a disubbidirti?

translation.en: And why would you need to do that?
Well, let's say that you tell me to stay put.
translation.it: Mettiamo che tu mi dica di non muovermi.

translation.en: "Alvin, if you move from that chair, you're grounded!"
translation.it: "Alvin, se ti alzi da quella sedia, ti metto in punizione!"

translation.en: But then I happen to see pirates
translation.it: Ma poi io vedo dei pirati

translation.en: climbing up ropes, ever so stealthy, from the side of the ship.
translation.it: che si arrampicano furtivi sulla nave usando delle corde.

translation.en: Now, it would be easy for me
to take my trusty old Swiss Army knife and cut the ropes.
translation.it: usare il mio fidato coltellino svizzero e tagliare quelle corde.

translation.en: But I have to stay put. Or do I?
Yes, Alvin, you do.
And what are you doing with a pocket knife?
translation.it: A cosa ti serve un coltellino?

translation.en: What pocket knife are you referring to?
Come on, give it to me. You could cut yourself.
translation.it: Avanti, dammelo. Potresti farti male. Avrei potuto salvare la nave ed evitare che venisse saccoggiata

translation.en: So, I could have saved the whole ship from robbage and pilgering
translation.it: Avrei potuto salvare la nave ed evitare che venisse saccoggiata

translation.en: and you'd still ground me?
translation.it: e tu mi metti in punizione?

translation.en: Alvin, there's no such word as robbage. And it's "pillaging."
translation.it: Alvin, non esiste la parola "saccoggiata". Si dice "saccheggiata".

translation.en: But he does have a point, Dave.
translation.it: Però non ha tutti i torti, Dave.

translation.en: There's got to be times when you trust us to take matters into our own hands.
translation.it: A volte devi lasciare che ce la sbrighiamo da soli.

translation.en: I trusted you tonight and look where that got me!
translation.it: Stasera mi sono fidato di voi e guardate cos'è successo!

translation.en: That's probably just the hot gravy talking.
translation.it: Credo sia colpa della salsa bollente.

translation.en: You're all lucky Captain Correlli has allowed you one more activity.
translation.it: Siete fortunati che il comandante vi abbia concesso un'altra attività.

translation.en: Is it hang gliding, wakeboarding, or bungee jumping?
translation.it: Andremo in deltaplano? Faremo sci d'acqua? Bungee jumping?

translation.en: No. Shuffleboard.
translation.it: No. Faremo il gioco della piastrella.

translation.en: (ALL GROAN) ALVIN: Man!
By my calculations,
it appears to be 10% shuffle, 90% bored.
translation.it: ci prenderemo a piastrellate per la noia.

translation.en: (GIGGLES) That's funny!
translation.it: ci prenderemo a piastrellate per la noia. Molto divertente!

translation.en: Oh, Thanks. You really think so?
You know, Dave, I think I'd prefer the plank.
translation.it: Sai, Dave, io preferirei finire a mare.

translation.en: Sorry, Alvin, but this is what you get to do.
translation.it: Mi dispiace, Alvin, ma farete questo.

translation.en: And I get to do something I haven't done in a long time.
translation.it: E io farò qualcosa che non faccio da tempo.

translation.en: Absolutely nothing.
ALVIN: Brittany approaches her puck,
adjusts her stance, looks over at me, quite annoyed,
wonders to herself if I'm ever going to shut my mouth,
translation.it: si chiede se chiuderò mai la bocca,

translation.en: realizes I'm not, and makes her move.
translation.it: capisce che non lo farò e fa la sua mossa.

translation.en: And... Oh!
Oh, it's short! (LAUGHING)
A costly error, ladies and gentlemen,
translation.it: Un errore che le costa caro, signore e signori,

translation.en: that's going to haunt her the rest of her career.
translation.it: e che la perseguiterà per il resto della sua carriera.

translation.en: You can make all the jokes you want, Alvin,
but not even you can make this interesting.
translation.it: ma non riuscirai a rendere interessante questo gioco.

translation.en: Oh, really? Well, care to make it interesting that I can make this interesting?
translation.it: Davvero? Be', vuoi scommettere che lo renderò interessante?

translation.en: Alvin, what are you up to? Need I remind you Dave is watching us.
translation.it: Alvin, cos'hai in mente? Ricordati che Dave ci sta osservando.

translation.en: Simon, the poor guy hasn't had a moment's peace since he met us.
translation.it: Dave non ha avuto un momento di pace da quando ci ha conosciuti.

translation.en: He's exhausted.
Check this out. In three, two, one.
translation.it: State a guardare. Tre, due, uno.

translation.en: Lights out.
Nap time! (SNORING)
Time to turn punishment into funishment.
translation.it: E ora passiamo dalla punizione alla ricreazione.

translation.en: (LAUGHING) You get it?
translation.it: E ora passiamo dalla punizione alla ricreazione. Avete capito?

translation.en: I took the "pun" in punishment, and turned it into "fun,"
translation.it: "Punizione" fa rima con "ricreazione", ma significa l'opposto.

translation.en: but kept the "ishment." It's word play!
translation.it: Fa rima. È un gioco di parole!

translation.en: What? Uh-huh.
ALVIN: Hey, kid!
Wanna make a trade? That's a nice-looking kite.
translation.it: Vuoi fare uno scambio? Bello quell'aquilone.

translation.en: ALVIN: Yeah!
I can see Russia from here!
translation.it: Da qui riesco a vedere la Russia!

translation.en: Come on, Simon, grab on.
Forget it. All I ever do is try to save him and it only gets me in trouble!
translation.it: Scordatevelo. Io cerco di salvarlo e lui mi caccia sempre nei guai.

translation.en: This won't end well.
Simon, do something!
Oh, seriously?
Simon, help!
Alvin's gotten himself in a bind. Looks like it's Simon saving him again!
translation.it: Alvin si è cacciato nei guai e Simon deve salvarlo un'altra volta.

translation.en: (LAUGHS) Thanks, bro.
Thank you! Huh?
MAN: Whoa! Hey!
SIMON: Dave! Dave! Ow!
ALL: Dave! THEODORE: Help us!
DAVE: Guys! Guys!
No! No! No, no, no! No! No!
CHIPMUNKS: Dave! Help us!
Oh, yeah.
Oh, no, no, no, no, no.
You want to go hang gliding,
sign up at the Excursion Desk like everyone else.
Ian, you don't understand! Oh, I think I do.
Dave Seville is so special that the rules don't apply to him.
translation.it: Dave Seville è così speciale che può infrangere le regole.

translation.en: Let go! No, you let go.
IAN: Hey! Come on! Great!
DAVE: Oh, my God!
IAN: I need my pelican head!
translation.it: Mi serve la testa da pellicano!

translation.en: DAVE: Help!
Ian! You idiot!
Great. Way to go, Seville.
Yeah, you!
Hey!
Save your breath, Dave. They'll come back for me.
translation.it: Risparmia il fiato, Dave. Torneranno a prendermi.

translation.en: In retrospect, this was a bad idea.
translation.it: Ripensandoci, è stata una pessima idea.

translation.en: We're losing altitude!
I don't think I can make it much longer.
translation.it: Non credo di poter resistere ancora a lungo.

translation.en: I'm so hungry. Just one bite.
A nibble? No nibbles.
Maybe I can just lick the glaze?
translation.it: Forse potrei solo leccare la glassa?

translation.en: The glaze is what's keeping you alive, Theodore!
translation.it: La glassa è quella che ti tiene in vita, Theodore!

translation.en: Its high fat content is creating a waterproof barrier.
translation.it: È ad alto contenuto di grassi e crea una barriera resistente all'acqua.

translation.en: I'm gonna starve to death!
Actually, there are many other things that will kill you before starvation.
translation.it: Veramente la fame è l'ultimo dei tuoi problemi.

translation.en: Dehydration, sunstroke...
(GASPS) An island.
No, an island would probably be helpful.
So if you see one, you should definitely say something.
translation.it: Quindi, se ne vedi una, di' qualcosa.

translation.en: Uh, Jeanette?
(LAUGHING) We're alive! We're alive!
Good. Because now
I'm going to kill you!
Guys, guys, guys! Nobody is killing anyone, okay?
No matter how much he deserves it.
Thank you, Si. Though I could have done without the passive aggression.
translation.it: Grazie, Simon. Ma non mi piace il tuo atteggiamento passivo-aggressivo.

translation.en: (CLEARS THROAT) Look, we've got nothing to worry about.
Dave knows we're gone by now.
translation.it: Dave avrà notato la nostra scomparsa

translation.en: He probably has the whole coast guard looking for us.
translation.it: e avrà chiesto aiuto alla guardia costiera.

translation.en: Meantime, why don't we all just relax and have some donut?
translation.it: Intanto, perché non ci rilassiamo e non ci mangiamo una ciambella?

translation.en: Did you guys want some?
Can't you kick any faster?
It's been two hours, Dave.
translation.it: Sono due ore che nuoto, Dave.

translation.en: Thanks to biannual Pilates classes, I have legs that won't quit,
translation.it: Grazie ai corsi di Pilates ho delle gambe forti,

translation.en: but they do slow down.
translation.it: ma dopo un po' si stancano.

translation.en: (SIGHS) Take those feet off, let me kick.
They don't come off. It's one piece.
translation.it: Non posso toglierle. È un costume intero.

translation.en: No quality mascot suit has removable feet.
translation.it: Nessun costume da mascotte di qualità ha i piedi rimovibili.

translation.en: Take the suit off, then.
I can't. Why not?
I'm not wearing anything underneath.
Look!
No, no, it's okay, I believe you.
No, look!
Look, an island!
Maybe the chipmunks washed up there.
translation.it: Forse i Chipmunk sono naufragati là.

translation.en: Kick!
Faster! Come on.
Okay, there we go.
It won't be long before a rescue plane sees our SOS
translation.it: Presto un aereo di soccorso vedrà il nostro SOS

translation.en: and flies us back to civilization.
I don't hear any planes.
Or helicopters.
THEODORE: Maybe Dave is coming in a hot-air balloon.
translation.it: Forse Dave verrà a prenderci con una mongolfiera.

translation.en: Because those things are really quiet.
I don't think Dave is gonna be in a hot-air balloon.
translation.it: Dave non verrà con una mongolfiera.

translation.en: But he is coming, right?
Of course he is.
Just maybe not today.
Alvin's right. We should prepare to stay the night.
translation.it: Alvin ha ragione. Dobbiamo prepararci per la notte.

translation.en: What? You guys expect me to sleep outside?
Last I checked, Brit, we're chipmunks.
We're used to living in the wild.
No, we used to be used to living in the wild.
Come on, Brit, it's just one night.
translation.it: Avanti, Brit, è solo per una notte.

translation.en: One cold night.
So we'll make a fire. We're always setting things on fire accidentally.
translation.it: Accenderemo un falò. Incendiamo sempre qualcosa per sbaglio.

translation.en: How hard can it be when we put our minds to it?
translation.it: Farlo di proposito non può essere così difficile.

translation.en: And how are you intending to do that?
I will create a spark by striking this rock with my Swiss Army knife,
translation.it: Creerò una scintilla sfregando questa roccia col mio coltellino svizzero

translation.en: which Dave took from me. (SNICKERS)
I suppose you have a better idea, smart guy?
translation.it: Tu credi di avere un'idea migliore, intelligentone?

translation.en: As a matter of fact, I do, smart guy.
As you can see, the lens concentrates the energy of the sun,
translation.it: Come potete vedere, le lenti attirano l'energia solare

translation.en: thus creating fire!
Whoa. Impressive.
(AWKWARDLY) Thanks. Thank you.
Thanks for thinking that.
Hot, hot, hot! (YELPS)
We have made fire!
So, what do we do now?
We've gotta head inland.
If we climb to the top of that mountain,
we'll be able to get a better view of the island,
see if they're here.
All right, got it.
What are you doing?
What? Building a fire.
You know, one time in the studio, Snoop ran out of matches,
translation.it: Una volta, in studio, Snoop è rimasto senza fiammiferi

translation.en: got a blaze going with just two carrot sticks.
translation.it: e ho acceso un fuoco sfregando due pezzi di carota.

translation.en: Figure, how hard can it be?
Forget the fire. We have to start hiking.
translation.it: Lascia perdere il fuoco. Dobbiamo andare.

translation.en: Yeah, okay, Dave. Look, it's getting dark-ish.
translation.it: Ascolta, Dave. Si sta facendo buio.

translation.en: It's gonna be cold. I'm gonna build a fire. We'll go in the morning.
translation.it: Farà freddo. Devo accendere un falò. Andremo domattina.

translation.en: (SHOUTING ANGRILY) No, we'll go now.
Don't take that tone of voice with me, Dave.
translation.it: Non usare quel tono con me, Dave.

translation.en: I'm not one of your chipmunks that you can just boss around
translation.it: Non puoi importi come fai con i tuoi Chipmunk

translation.en: and stuff into a cage whenever you feel like it.
translation.it: e infilarmi in gabbia quando ti pare.

translation.en: That was you, Ian!
Calm down.
Jeez, no wonder those furballs would rather fly off the ship
translation.it: Ora capisco perché quelle palle di pelo hanno preferito lasciare la nave

translation.en: than spend another day with you.
translation.it: piuttosto che trascorrere un altro giorno con te.

translation.en: They didn't do it on purpose.
It was an accident. They're just kids.
translation.it: È stato un incidente. Sono ancora piccoli.

translation.en: I don't know how long they can survive out there.
translation.it: Non so quanto a lungo riusciranno a sopravvivere là fuori.

translation.en: ALVIN: And you guys were worried. (LAUGHING) Look at us!
translation.it: E voi che vi preoccupavate! Guardateci!

translation.en: We're warm, we got a great fire going, beautiful night sky
translation.it: Siamo al caldo, il fuoco è acceso, il cielo è splendido

translation.en: and if a rescue helicopter comes by, they'll see us!
translation.it: e, se dovesse passare un elicottero, ci vedrebbe subito!

translation.en: Everything's gonna be fine.
Good night, guys.
Good night. Good night.
(YAWNS) Good night.
Night.
ALL: Theodore!
What? Dave always turns off the light after saying good night.
translation.it: Che c'è? Dave spegne sempre la luce dopo che ci siamo dati la buonanotte.

translation.en: That fire was sort of the only thing keeping us from freezing to death.
translation.it: Quel falò era l'unica cosa che ci impediva di morire congelati.

translation.en: Yeah! Can't you just relight it?
How? With your glasses. And the sun?
translation.it: -E come? -Con gli occhiali. E il sole?

translation.en: All right! Way to keep the spirits up, guys.
Doing it, yeah!
And what is this supposed to be? Breakfast!
No, it's bark.
Yeah, for breakfast!
I bet it's very good.
It's not.
It's been forever since our last all-you-can-eat buffet.
translation.it: È passata una vita dal nostro ultimo buffet libero.

translation.en: Crazy suggestion, guys,
let's get off this beach and let's find some real food.
translation.it: Lasciamo questa spiaggia e cerchiamo del cibo vero.

translation.en: If I know my horticulture, and I do, this is a grove of mango trees.
translation.it: Se conosco bene l'orticoltura, ed è così, questi dovrebbero essere alberi di mango.

translation.en: Then where are all the mangoes?
Maybe the Jungle Monster 4 ate them all!
translation.it: Forse il mostro della giungla 4 li ha divorati tutti!

translation.en: You were planning on sharing that, right?
translation.it: Pensavi di dividerlo con noi, giusto?

translation.en: (LAUGHS NERVOUSLY) Of course.
Oh, well, good.
'Cause it kind of looked like you were gonna eat it all by yourself.
translation.it: Perché sembrava quasi che volessi mangiarlo tutto tu.

translation.en: What? I would never do that.
I don't believe you!
Hey!
Yeah! Winning!
What?
I'll make sure to save you the pit!
translation.it: Ti terrò da parte il nocciolo!

translation.en: Oh, my acorns!
Way to go, Theodore! Come on, we'll split it.
Don't listen to him, Theo.
He's gonna eat it all by himself.
I'll share it with you.
No. She's trying to trick you.
No, you're trying to trick him.
No, you're trying to trick him by saying I'm trying to trick him.
translation.it: No, tu vuoi fregarlo dicendogli che io voglio fregarlo.

translation.en: He's lying, Theo!
(GASPS) What?
Theodore, I am so sorry!
My precious! My precious!
translation.it: Il mio tesoro! Il mio tesoro!

translation.en: Stop it! Stop it! Stop it! Look at us.
One day on this island and we've become animals!
translation.it: Dopo un giorno su quest'isola, siamo già diventati degli animali!

translation.en: (GASPS) Did you hear that?
(GASPS) What was that? Jungle Monster.
Positions, everybody.
Hold.
Hold.
Fire!
No! Why?
Please don't eat us, Mr. Jungle Monster!
translation.it: Non mangiarci, signor mostro della giungla!

translation.en: I'm not a monster, I'm Zoe. And I'm clearly a girl
translation.it: Non sono un mostro. Sono Zoe. E chiaramente sono una donna

translation.en: who has been on this island for so long
translation.it: che è rimasta su quest'isola così a lungo

translation.en: that now she's imagining that squirrels can talk.
We are chipmunks.
Yeah, Alvin and the Chipmunks.
Who and the what now?
I'm sure you've heard of the Chipettes. We're kind of world famous.
translation.it: Avrai sentito parlare delle Chipette. Siamo molto famose.

translation.en: Who?
Maybe this will help.
ALVIN: Lame! Okay. Stop.
I don't know who you are.
Awkward!
Exactly how long have you been here?
Well, I got here on a Monday, so...
translation.it: Be', sono arrivata di lunedì, quindi...

translation.en: Yeah, like, you know, eight or nine years?
Nine years? Wait. You've been here nine years?
translation.it: Nove anni? Aspetta. Vivi qui da nove anni?

translation.en: Well, it could be eight.
(GASPS) What if we're here nine years?
translation.it: E se noi dovessimo restare qui nove anni?

translation.en: What if we're here forever?
translation.it: E se dovessimo restare per sempre?

translation.en: I told you, Dave's coming.
translation.it: Ho già detto che Dave sta arrivando.

translation.en: I used to think that Dave was coming, too.
And he never did.
Dave Henderson, my supervisor at UPS.
translation.it: Dave Henderson, il mio supervisore alla UPS.

translation.en: I used to fly cargo planes for them,
until one day I crash-landed in the ocean.
translation.it: quando un giorno sono precipitata nell'oceano.

translation.en: We crash-landed, too. Really?
But our Dave won't rest until he finds us.
translation.it: Ma il nostro Dave non troverà pace finché non ci avrà trovati.

translation.en: Right, Alvin?
Absolutely. (CHUCKLES NERVOUSLY)
You mean I'm finally gonna get out of here?
I can't wait to go tell the others!
(GASPS) There are others?
I mean, can you guys imagine being stuck here for all these years
translation.it: Sapete cosa significa vivere qui per tanti anni

translation.en: without anybody to talk to?
I think I'd lose my mind!
Chipmunks, I'm pleased to introduce my friends.
translation.it: Chipmunk, vi presento i miei amici:

translation.en: This is Rawlings, Spalding, Callaway, Dunlop, and, right there, that's Nerf.
translation.it: Rawlings, Spalding, Callaway, Dunlop e lì c'è Nerf.

translation.en: Hey, girlfriend, you look good.
They survived the crash with me.
translation.it: Sono sopravvissuti allo schianto con me.

translation.en: Okay.
Hi. Hi.
Okay. Hello.
I'm Theodore.
Guys, Dave is coming to get us!
No, not Dave Henderson. I saw your face!
translation.it: No, non Dave Henderson. Non fare quella faccia!

translation.en: It's another Dave.
But, you guys, just get excited. We're finally gonna get off this island.
translation.it: Dovreste essere felici! Finalmente lasceremo l'isola.

translation.en: She's funny.
In a crazy sort of way.
This totally calls for a party. Who's hungry?
Yeah! Yes, please!
We are famished. I'm hungry.
Yeah? Let's go to my place.
Is it far? I don't think I could walk another step.
translation.it: È lontano? Non ce la faccio più a camminare.

translation.en: Who said anything about walking?
BRITTANY: We're gonna die!
Oh, man! That was so cool!
I know, I know!
Come on. Come on in, guys! Bring it in.
Come on down!
Yeah! Wasn't that awesome?
No, it was not awesome. It's a miracle we got here safely.
translation.it: Niente affatto. È un miracolo se siamo arrivati sani e salvi.

translation.en: In fact, the odds of a chipmunk
getting hurt on a zip-line are one out of six.
translation.it: si ferisca su una teleferica sono una su sei.

translation.en: (GROANS) Why do I always have to be right?
Ellie, Ellie! Are you okay?
I think I sprained my ankle!
translation.it: Credo di essermi slogata la caviglia!

translation.en: Ooh, you know what, you should put some ice on that.
Oh, no, guys, I don't have any ice. I live there in that tree.
translation.it: Be', no, io non ho del ghiaccio. Vivo su quell'albero.

translation.en: I thought that maybe you did, though.
No, we don't have any ice. Just like we don't have any shelter.
translation.it: No, noi non abbiamo del ghiaccio. E non abbiamo un riparo.

translation.en: Wow, that's a major bummer for you.
Do you guys like bungee jumping? Yes!
No. We do not.
Listen, lady, maybe you should just leave us alone
translation.it: Ascolta, forse dovresti lasciarci in pace,

translation.en: so we can focus more on surviving and less on killing ourselves.
Whoa, that is a lot of uptight in a very little package.
translation.it: Caspita, sei parecchio apprensivo per essere così piccolo.

translation.en: I'm not uptight. I just don't wanna see anyone else getting hurt. Ow!
translation.it: Non sono apprensivo. Non voglio che qualcun altro si faccia male.

translation.en: Criminy. What was that?
You know what, that was just a spider
and they live here because this is nature.
translation.it: e vivono qui perché siamo in un bosco.

translation.en: It is not just a spider, it's a Phoneutria bahiensis.
translation.it: Non è un semplice ragno. È una Phoneutria bahiensis.

translation.en: Its bite contains a neurotoxin.
translation.it: Il suo morso contiene una neurotossina.

translation.en: Ooh! Mr. Fancy Words. So what?
Alvin, toxin? Poison? Neuro? Brain?
Oh. That's not good.
Side effects include changes in personality,
translation.it: Gli effetti collaterali includono disturbo della personalità,

translation.en: loss of inhibition, dry mouth.
translation.it: perdita di ogni inibizione e assenza di saliva.

translation.en: Okay, calm down. I get bitten probably twice a day by these little fellows
translation.it: Ora calmatevi. Io vengo morsa due volte al giorno

translation.en: and I am still completely normal.
Yes, normal.
DAVE: Alvin? Simon!
Chubby one!
Girl chubby one!
I hope they're okay.
Who cares if they're okay? I just need them to be here.
translation.it: A chi importa. Spero solo che siano qui.

translation.en: And here I am thinking you've changed and don't only care about yourself.
translation.it: E io che pensavo che fossi cambiato. Pensi ancora sempre e solo a te stesso.

translation.en: Nope. And it's a good thing, too.
Because right now the rage I'm feeling for you and those chipmunks
translation.it: Perché la rabbia che provo per te e quegli scoiattoli

translation.en: is the only thing keeping me going.
translation.it: è l'unica cosa che mi fa andare avanti.

translation.en: Shall we keep going?
Ian, just keep an eye out for something to eat or drink, all right?
translation.it: Ian, cerchiamo di trovare qualcosa da mangiare o da bere.

translation.en: All right. Right there!
Where? That thing around your neck.
You're not gonna eat this. This was a gift from Theodore.
translation.it: Non puoi mangiarlo. È un regalo di Theodore.

translation.en: That explains it. I was gonna say, it's really ugly.
translation.it: Ecco perché mi sembrava tanto brutto.

translation.en: Like, really... Wow.
Ugly. It's not ugly.
It goes with everything and it's soft enough to sleep in.
translation.it: Posso metterlo con tutto e posso anche dormirci.

translation.en: Yeah, and it's edible.
You will not eat my son's necklace.
translation.it: Non mangerai la collana di mio figlio.

translation.en: He's not your son, Dave. He's just a chipmunk.
translation.it: Non è tuo figlio, Dave. È solo uno scoiattolo.

translation.en: Oh, Dave. Where are you?
Where are you, Alvin?
IAN: All right.
I'm gonna crash.
Simon. Where are you going?
(WITH FRENCH ACCENT) Who is this Simon you speak of?
Um, you?
No, my name is not Simon. It is
translation.it: No, io non mi chiamo Simon. Mi chiamo

translation.en: That's pretty close to Simon.
And yet completely different.
Would you care to join me on my adventure?
translation.it: Vorresti unirti a me in un'avventura?

translation.en: What adventure?
The adventure called life!
Okay.
But just until Dave shows up.
translation.it: Ma solo finché non arriva Dave.

translation.en: Simon and Theodore are gone.
They probably just went to get stuff for the shelter.
translation.it: Saranno andati a prendere qualcosa per costruire un rifugio.

translation.en: It's all the guy can talk about.
Still, it's not like them to wander off like that.
translation.it: Non è da loro andarsene via così.

translation.en: Could you please go look for them?
Why can't you?
I have a situation of my own to deal with, Alvin.
translation.it: Io ho già i miei problemi, Alvin.

translation.en: Oh, right. How is Eleanor doing?
Huh? She's fine. I'm talking about me.
It's been two days since my last bath and I am a mess.
translation.it: Sono due giorni che non mi lavo e sono un vero disastro.

translation.en: I can't get rescued looking like this.
translation.it: Non posso farmi salvare conciata così.

translation.en: Oy.
Bonjour, my friend.
Simon? Are you bungee jumping?
His name is not Simon. It is Simone.
translation.it: -Lui non si chiama Simon. -Mi chiamo Simone.

translation.en: That's pretty close to Simon.
Yeah, I thought so, too. But he's acting totally different.
translation.it: Già. Lo pensavo anch'io. Ma si comporta in modo del tutto diverso.

translation.en: The spider bite! That's it! Remember the side effects?
translation.it: Il ragno! Ecco cos'è stato! Ricordi gli effetti collaterali?

translation.en: Personality changes, loss of inhibition?
translation.it: Disturbo della personalità, perdita di ogni inibizione?

translation.en: Lies! Who are you?
Wow! Simone is pretty cool.
translation.it: Caspita! Simone è proprio un gran figo.

translation.en: It's Simon, Theodore. And, no, he's not.
translation.it: Si chiama Simon, Theodore, e non lo è affatto.

translation.en: Alvin. It's Alvin!
Whoo! C'est magnifique, Simone!
Okay, Theo, it's all you.
Really? I've never done anything like this.
translation.it: Davvero? Io non ho mai fatto nulla di simile.

translation.en: And you never will.
How can you let him do this? What are you thinking?
translation.it: Perché glielo fai fare? Sei impazzita?

translation.en: I'm thinking, "When did my dad wash up on this island?"
translation.it: E perché tu ti comporti come un vecchietto?

translation.en: What? We were having the best time.
Why do you have to show up and be so uptight?
Me? Uptight?
I'm not the uptight one, I'm the fun one!
translation.it: Io non sono apprensivo! Sono divertente!

translation.en: The cool one. Ask anybody.
translation.it: Sono un fico! Chiedi a chi vuoi.

translation.en: Who should I ask? (LAUGHING)
Come on. Theodore, you can't bungee jump.
translation.it: Avanti. Theodore, non puoi fare bungee jumping.

translation.en: You get scared just watching a movie.
translation.it: Ti spaventa anche solo guardare un film.

translation.en: Munk up, Alvin.
(MUFFLED) A little help?
Ah! Much better.
Jeanette, these dresses are, like, totally adorbs. I die.
Thank you. And I also made these for you, Eleanor.
translation.it: Grazie. E ho preparato queste per te, Eleanor.

translation.en: Oh, look how handy you are all of a sudden.
And in case you get tired, I made you a wheelchair.
translation.it: E in caso ti stancassi, ti ho costruito una sedia a rotelle.

translation.en: Oh, super.
A kiss. Enchante, mademoiselles.
A kiss. And a...
(LAUGHS) A kiss.
Spider venom. What's gotten into him?
Yeah, yeah, he thinks he's some sort of fun-loving French dude.
translation.it: Già. Si crede uno spassoso francese.

translation.en: Now he thinks he's... Really?
(MIMICKING SIMONE) The most interesting munk in the world.
translation.it: Lo scoiattolo più interessante del mondo.

translation.en: Simone? Oui?
I think we should get to work on that shelter.
translation.it: Credo che dovremmo costruire quel rifugio.

translation.en: Pourquoi? I cannot imagine a better roof over our heads
translation.it: Non c'è miglior tetto sulle nostre teste

translation.en: than the stars in the sky.
translation.it: di un cielo pieno di stelle.

translation.en: What about the kind of roof over our head that's actually a roof?
translation.it: E se invece costruissimo un vero tetto?

translation.en: It's going to rain!
What is a little rain? Hmm?
translation.it: Ma cos'è un po' di pioggia?

translation.en: We cherish the water, for it is the water that nurtures the flower.
translation.it: Noi amiamo l'acqua, perché nutre i fiori.

translation.en: (THUNDER CRASHES) Okay. This is crazy!
translation.it: Ora basta. Tutto questo è assurdo!

translation.en: Building a shelter was your idea. Yours!
translation.it: Tu hai avuto l'idea di costruire un rifugio! Tu!

translation.en: Oh, great. Great!
All right, guys, we're gonna build a shelter.
translation.it: D'accordo, ragazzi. Andiamo a costruire un rifugio.

translation.en: I need everyone's help. Let's go.
translation.it: Mi serve l'aiuto di tutti. Andiamo.

translation.en: I'll try. But I feel so useless.
translation.it: Ci proverò, ma mi sento così inutile.

translation.en: What are you doing? What I've wanted to do
translation.it: -Cosa stai facendo? -Ciò che ho desiderato fare

translation.en: since the moment I laid my eyes all over on you.
translation.it: dal momento in cui ti ho vista.

translation.en: What? Huh?
Hey, you guys are going to catch pneumonia
dancing in the rain like that.
You ought to be careful kicking mud around like that.
Hello?
Someone could lose an eye!
That looks like fun.
Eleanor? Would you care to dance? I'd love to.
translation.it: -Eleanor? Ti andrebbe di ballare? -Mi piacerebbe molto.

translation.en: With me? (LAUGHS) Yes, Theodore!
BRITTANY: I can't believe Jeanette's getting all the attention.
translation.it: Jeanette non può essere al centro dell'attenzione.

translation.en: I'm the pretty one. Jeanette's the smart one.
translation.it: Sono io quella carina. Jeanette è quella intelligente.

translation.en: You don't see me running around trying to be all smart, do you?
translation.it: Io non cerco di fare l'intelligente del gruppo!

translation.en: I know! I'm the fun one,
you're the pretty one. Yeah!
Do you know how slippery that dirt is? This is ridiculous.
translation.it: Quel fango è molto scivoloso! È assurdo.

translation.en: Are you even listening to me?
Alvin? You're starting to sound like Dave.
(SCREAMING) No!
What are you doing?
Ugh. Building a shelter.
Since I'm not the fun one anymore
translation.it: Visto che non sono più quello divertente,

translation.en: I figure I may as well be... (SHUDDERS)
The responsible one.
Ew. Really?
Well, since I'm not the pretty one anymore, maybe I should build a shelter, too.
translation.it: E visto che io non sono più quella carina, forse dovrei aiutarti col rifugio.

translation.en: Yeah, good luck with that.
What, you don't think I could do it?
translation.it: Credi che io non sia in grado?

translation.en: Hey, I didn't say that, Brit.
I thought it, but I didn't say it.
translation.it: L'ho pensato, ma non l'ho detto.

translation.en: So you wanna play it this way.
He's so French.
Oh! Be careful, Simone!
Let's do it.
ELEANOR: Oh, no.
Now, wasn't that a pleasant ride?
Good thing we don't wear pants.
translation.it: Per fortuna non portiamo i pantaloni.

translation.en: Okay, you guys, come on, come over.
Are you sure it's safe? Of course it's safe.
I do this thing every day.
Jeanette! THEODORE: Jeanette!
Hold on, Jeanette.
No, no. Look into my eyes.
You have nothing to fear.
Yes, yes. Very good.
Voila! You are safe. Bravo!
You're so brave. You made it!
ELEANOR: Pretty.
Double rainbow. What does it mean?
Alive they're superstars, sure. But dead? They're legends.
translation.it: Vivi sono delle superstar, ma da morti diventeranno delle leggende.

translation.en: I'm talking about tribute albums, pay-per-view funerals.
translation.it: Sto parlando di album tributo e funerali in pay-per-view.

translation.en: Wait a second. You actually think I'm in this for the money?
translation.it: Aspetta un attimo. Credi che io lo faccia per i soldi?

translation.en: Well, if you're doing it to pick up chicks, you're doing a lousy job.
translation.it: Be', se lo fai per conquistare le donne, direi che non funziona.

translation.en: I'm doing this because I love them, okay?
translation.it: Lo faccio perché gli voglio bene.

translation.en: Look, if you wanna spend the rest of your life
translation.it: Se tu vuoi passare il resto della vita

translation.en: running around after a bunch of spoiled brats, be my guest.
translation.it: a rincorrere delle pesti, fai pure.

translation.en: They're not brats. Really? Even Alvin?
You never even bothered to get to know them, Ian.
translation.it: Tu non hai mai cercato di conoscerli, Ian.

translation.en: I mean, sure, Alvin can be kind of a handful,
translation.it: Alvin a volte può essere difficile da gestire,

translation.en: but he means well.
He's sometimes just a little irresponsible, that's all.
translation.it: A volte è solo un po' irresponsabile. Tutto qui.

translation.en: But, come on, Simon?
He's probably the most level-headed kid I know.
translation.it: È molto maturo per la sua età.

translation.en: If anything, he's a little too uptight.
translation.it: Forse a volte è un po' apprensivo.

translation.en: And then there's little Theodore.
translation.it: E poi c'è il piccolo Theodore.

translation.en: Dave, I barely cared about what you had to say about the first two.
translation.it: Dave, già mi interessava poco ciò che avevi da dire sui primi due.

translation.en: I can't imagine the big-boned one is gonna be any more interesting.
translation.it: Dubito che quello grassoccio dei tre sia più interessante.

translation.en: Forget it, let's just keep going.
Up, poisson, up!
Oh, no. This is terrible.
Shouldn't he have come up by now?
Uh-oh. Simone! Where are you?
Zoe, you've gotta do something.
All right.
Callaway, I need you to go in there and find Simone.
translation.it: Callaway, vai là sotto e trova Simone.

translation.en: I know you can do it, little buddy.
You're kidding, right?
If Callaway can't find him, nobody can. (EXCLAIMS IN PAIN)
translation.it: Se non lo troverà Callaway, non ci riuscirà nessun altro.

translation.en: (GASPS) Simone!
Told you.
I'm sorry if I caused you any worry, mademoiselle.
translation.it: Mi scusi se l'ho fatta preoccupare, mademoiselle.

translation.en: But I have something for you. Maybe this will be a way to make it up.
translation.it: Ma ho qualcosa per te. Forse così mi farò perdonare.

translation.en: Oh! It's beautiful!
Where did you find it?
Yeah, it is beautiful. Where did you find it?
translation.it: Già. È splendido. Dove l'hai trovato?

translation.en: In a cave behind the waterfall.
translation.it: In una grotta dietro la cascata.

translation.en: I thought it would look nice on you.
But now I realize even the most precious gem cannot compare to your beauty.
translation.it: Ma neanche la gemma più preziosa può superare la tua bellezza.

translation.en: Yeah. Were there any other jewels or gems or diamonds
translation.it: Già. C'erano forse gioielli, gemme o diamanti

translation.en: or anything else in there?
By the time I found the gold,
I had already been gone from my Jeanette far too long. Aw!
translation.it: ho capito che mi mancava la mia Jeanette.

translation.en: What?
You guys, they found it. They found it!
And the best part is, they don't even know what they found.
translation.it: E non sanno nemmeno cos'hanno trovato.

translation.en: They think that it's just one bracelet.
translation.it: Credono si tratti solo di un braccialetto.

translation.en: Which means that the rest of the treasure is mine.
translation.it: Questo significa che il resto del tesoro è mio.

translation.en: All mine! (LAUGHING MANIACALLY)
(GRUNTING) What the...
Whoa! What are you?
Hey! Oh!
Yeah, you're one of those honey badgers.
translation.it: Devi essere una sorta di tasso.

translation.en: You just take what you want.
Drop it. Drop it!
You mess with me, ese,
translation.it: Se ti metti contro di me,

translation.en: I'll go loco on you.
Give it back!
You can sting like a bee or strike like a cobra,
translation.it: Puoi anche pungere come un'ape o attaccare come un cobra,

translation.en: but this honey munk don't care!
Okay, Brit, I'm all done.
If you want, I can help you get started... Whoa!
translation.it: Se vuoi, posso aiutarti a cominciare...

translation.en: This tree house is awesome.
Maybe you are kind of the smart one.
translation.it: Forse sei tu l'intelligentona del gruppo.

translation.en: Thank you, Alvin. And yours is...
translation.it: Grazie, Alvin, e la tua è proprio...

translation.en: Well,
you did your best.
Anyhoo, no reason we can't be comfortable and stylish
translation.it: Ma non c'è motivo per non vivere in modo comodo ed elegante

translation.en: while we wait for Dave to show up, right?
Brit, I...
I think I know why Dave hasn't come.
translation.it: Credo di sapere perché Dave non è ancora arrivato.

translation.en: You do? Why?
'Cause he's not even looking.
Alvin, why wouldn't he be looking for us?
Because I drive him crazy.
You know, the way Simon's been driving me crazy?
translation.it: Come Simon sta facendo impazzire me.

translation.en: I mean, that's what I've been doing to Dave.
translation.it: È così che io mi sono comportato con Dave.

translation.en: For years.
No wonder he hates me.
translation.it: Non c'è da stupirsi se mi odia.

translation.en: Don't worry, Alvin.
I'm sure Dave will come.
I mean, he certainly loves Simon and Theodore.
translation.it: Di certo vuole bene a Simon e Theodore.

translation.en: Simon? Is Dave ever gonna find us?
translation.it: Simon? Credi che Dave riuscirà a trovarci?

translation.en: Simon? I mean, Simone?
I'm so sorry, were you speaking to moi?
Yes! About Dave!
Are we ever going to find him?
I see you are sad, mon ami.
translation.it: Vedo che sei triste, mon ami.

translation.en: And I hate to see you sad.
I will help you find your friend Dave.
translation.it: Ti aiuterò a trovare il tuo amico Dave.

translation.en: You really think you can find him?
I know I can!
And then I will find this Simon you keep speaking of!
translation.it: E poi troverò anche questo Simon di cui parli sempre!

translation.en: As Dave and I have never met, I will need you to describe him for me.
translation.it: Visto che io non conosco Dave, devi descrivermelo.

translation.en: Well, he's very kind and a good storyteller.
translation.it: Be', è un tipo gentile e racconta bene le fiabe.

translation.en: Mmm-hmm. Very helpful.
Oh! And he's about this tall.
translation.it: Molto utile. Ed è alto più o meno così.

translation.en: Is he by any chance a big, flightless bird?
translation.it: È per caso un enorme uccello che non sa volare?

translation.en: I don't think so.
Then these footprints must not be his.
translation.it: Allora queste impronte non devono essere sue.

translation.en: (GASPS) Jungle Monster!
Do you hear that?
Yeah, it's my stomach grumbling.
No, no, maybe it's a helicopter! Listen!
translation.it: No, no. Sembra un elicottero! Ascolta!

translation.en: Face it, Dave, no one is coming to rescue us, okay?
translation.it: Arrenditi, Dave. Nessuno verrà a salvarci, d'accordo?

translation.en: And my stomach noises are gonna get louder and louder and louder
translation.it: E il mio stomaco emetterà rumori sempre più forti,

translation.en: until one day they just stop.
translation.it: finché un giorno non si placheranno.

translation.en: Because I will have eaten you.
Maybe you're right. Maybe no one's coming.
translation.it: Forse hai ragione. Forse non verrà nessuno a salvarci.

translation.en: Maybe the chipmunks aren't here at all. Maybe they're gone.
translation.it: Forse i Chipmunk non sono qui. Forse sono morti.

translation.en: I really messed up.
Dave, it kills me to say this, kills me, but...
Look, man,
you're really good with those kids, really good.
translation.it: tu sei grandioso con quei ragazzi.

translation.en: They love you.
And I should know because I was really bad with those kids and they hate me.
translation.it: E io posso dirlo con certezza perché sono stato cattivo e mi odiano.

translation.en: But, look, you should know that whatever happens,
you did nothing wrong. Nothing.
translation.it: tu non hai sbagliato nulla. Nulla.

translation.en: Thanks, Ian.
Come here.
Yeah. Yeah.
The Jungle Monster's real! And it's angry!
translation.it: Il mostro della giungla esiste davvero! Ed è furioso!

translation.en: Or hungry. Allons-y!
That means let's go.
Great, a volcano.
Of course! That's why the water was so hot!
translation.it: Ma certo! Ecco perché l'acqua è così calda.

translation.en: It's being heated by the underground magma chamber!
translation.it: È riscaldata dal magma che è sotto terra!

translation.en: How do you know that? I have no idea!
translation.it: -E tu come lo sai? -Non ne ho idea!

translation.en: The place where I get my nails done always has the Science Channel on.
translation.it: L'estetista che mi fa la manicure segue il canale scientifico.

translation.en: Maybe I accidentally paid attention.
Hey, guys, anyone up for a quick hike?
translation.it: Ehi, ragazzi, vi va di fare un'escursione?

translation.en: Like, I don't know, maybe to the waterfall or whatever?
Not now, Zoe! The whole island is going to explode!
translation.it: Non adesso, Zoe! L'isola sta per esplodere!

translation.en: What?
translation.it: Non adesso, Zoe! L'isola sta per esplodere! Cosa?

translation.en: Guys, we've got to get off this island. We have to build a raft, now.
translation.it: Ragazzi, dobbiamo lasciare l'isola. Dobbiamo costruire subito una zattera.

translation.en: "Right now" like, right now?
Or "right now" like, after a hike to the waterfall now?
translation.it: O prima possiamo fare un'escursione alla cascata?

translation.en: (GRUNTS) I've been hit!
By Dave's necklace?
Tell Jeanette I will watch over her with angel wings.
translation.it: Di' a Jeanette che la proteggerò come suo angelo custode.

translation.en: SIMONE: Dave? Ha ha!
Told you we'd find him!
It is Simone, but I am often confused for this Simon fellow.
translation.it: Mi chiamo Simone, ma spesso mi scambiano per questo Simon.

translation.en: Perhaps we look alike?
Simone? Ian!
Hey, you found the chubby one.
DAVE: Don't worry, Theodore.
Nothing's gonna happen to you. Is it?
(WHIMPERS) What was that?
That's an active volcano.
Okay, Brittany and I will build the deck.
translation.it: D'accordo. Io e Brittany penseremo alla struttura.

translation.en: Eleanor, you need to start braiding ropes.
Jeanette, find as many coconuts and mangoes as you can.
translation.it: Jeanette, raccogli più noci di cocco e mango che puoi.

translation.en: Who knows how long we'll be out there.
translation.it: Non sappiamo quanto resteremo in mare.

translation.en: What can I do to help?
Dave! Dave!
ELEANOR: Dave!
(GIGGLES EXCITEDLY) You found us! Hey.
We missed you so much.
I knew you would find us.
Eleanor! What happened?
You know, just a zip-line accident.
A what? I'm fine.
It only hurts when I try to explain it.
translation.it: Fa solo male quando devo spiegarlo.

translation.en: Okay, you know what, never mind.
The important thing is you guys are safe.
translation.it: L'importante è che stiate tutti bene.

translation.en: Everything's gonna be okay.
Hey, what is it?
I thought you'd never find us.
translation.it: Credevo che non ci avresti mai trovati.

translation.en: That you weren't even looking.
translation.it: Che non ci stessi neppure cercando.

translation.en: Why wouldn't I look for you?
Because I'm such a pain in the...
I know, you don't think I'm a pain.
translation.it: So che non pensi che io sia un rompi.

translation.en: No, you're a pain. But I'd come, no matter what.
translation.it: No, lo sei. Ma sarei venuto a salvarti comunque.

translation.en: SIMONE: Arc de Triomphe, mayonnaise, Napoleon.
I get it, Frenchie, you come from a rich history.
translation.it: Ho capito, francesino, avete un passato ricco di storia.

translation.en: Well, guess what, we're all gonna be history if we don't get out of here.
translation.it: Ma anche noi diventeremo storia se non ce ne andiamo di qui.

translation.en: CHIPETTES: (GASPING) Uncle Ian!
What's he doing here?
It's kind of a long story.
Don't worry, he's cool.
Yes, for a pelican man.
Oh, yeah, nothing cooler than a grown man in a pelican suit.
translation.it: Non c'è niente di più fico di un uomo adulto vestito da pellicano.

translation.en: So, Dave, how are we gonna get out of here?
translation.it: Allora, Dave, come ce ne andiamo da qui?

translation.en: I don't know, Alvin, I think you've got this under control.
translation.it: Non lo so, Alvin. Credevo avessi tutto sotto controllo.

translation.en: Theodore, you and Eleanor are on rope duty.
translation.it: Theodore, tu e Eleanor pensate alle corde.

translation.en: Dave and Ian, we need oars.
translation.it: Dave e Ian, servono dei remi.

translation.en: Simone, you and Jeanette are in charge of food.
translation.it: Simone, tu e Jeanette pensate al cibo.

translation.en: And, Zoe... No, I know, I know.
I'm gonna go and I'm gonna pack up my balls!
translation.it: Vado a prendere le mie palle!

translation.en: Who's that?
Another long story.
Yeah! Good work, guys! Let's get off this island.
This raft won't build itself.
translation.it: La zattera non si costruisce da sola.

translation.en: Go! Go! Go!
Heave! ALVIN: Ho!
BRITTANY: Heave! ALVIN: Ho!
Heave! ALVIN: Ho!
It's incredible, you guys.
Very impressive.
Just seeing everyone come together to build it...
(VOLCANO RUMBLING) I just want to say...
It can wait.
Wait, where are Jeanette and Simone?
translation.it: Un attimo. Dove sono Jeanette e Simone?

translation.en: (EXHALING) I hope this is going to be enough.
(GASPS) Did you hear something?
Who can say?
When I am with you, all I can hear is the beating of my own heart.
translation.it: Quando sono con te, sento solo il battito del mio cuore.

translation.en: (PANTING) Oh, no!
Somebody! Help!
ALVIN: Guys! Guys! Over here! Come quick, hurry!
translation.it: Ragazzi! Ragazzi! Da questa parte! Sbrigatevi!

translation.en: Simone, are you okay? Simone!
Why are you calling me Simone?
Simon? Yeah.
(LAUGHS) You're back! It finally wore off!
translation.it: Sei di nuovo tu! L'effetto è cessato!

translation.en: What wore off?
translation.it: Sei di nuovo tu! L'effetto è cessato! Quale effetto?

translation.en: You were bitten by a spider. It, like, messed up your brain.
translation.it: Sei stato morso da un ragno e non eri più tu.

translation.en: Ah. Is that why I think I see Dave
translation.it: Per questo mi sembra di vedere Dave

translation.en: and a half-Ian, half-bird?
translation.it: e un Ian mezzo uomo e mezzo uccello?

translation.en: No, it's really me. And really Ian.
translation.it: No. Sono proprio io. E c'è anche Ian.

translation.en: 'Sup?
translation.it: No. Sono proprio io. E c'è anche Ian. Come va?

translation.en: Simon, where's Jeanette? She was out here with you.
translation.it: Simon, dov'è Jeanette? Era con te.

translation.en: Jeanette? I don't know...
I do.
It's Zoe. She took her.
Simon, I need to know where you found that gold bracelet.
translation.it: Simon, devo sapere dove hai trovato quel bracciale d'oro.

translation.en: What gold bracelet?
The one you gave to Jeanette.
translation.it: Quello che hai dato a Jeanette.

translation.en: What? When did I give Jeanette a bracelet?
translation.it: Cosa? Quando ho dato un bracciale a Jeanette?

translation.en: On your date.
(GASPS) Jeanette and I are dating?
Okay, he's useless.
Theodore, Eleanor, you're gonna have to lead the way.
I don't remember exactly how to get there.
translation.it: Non ricordo bene come siamo arrivati là.

translation.en: I do!
Which way, Eleanor?
Make a left. No, right. No, left!
translation.it: A sinistra. No, a destra. No, a sinistra!

translation.en: I thought you said you knew where you were going.
I do! Sometimes I just forget my left from my right.
translation.it: Infatti! Ma a volte non distinguo la destra dalla sinistra.

translation.en: That way!
Okay, we just have to cross here.
translation.it: D'accordo. Ora dobbiamo solo passare dall'altra parte.

translation.en: (GASPS) Are you kidding me?
Guys, I can't do that.
translation.it: Ragazzi, io non ce la faccio.

translation.en: But, Simon, you already did.
translation.it: Ma Simon, tu l'hai già fatto una volta.

translation.en: No, I didn't. That was Simone, that was not me.
translation.it: Non è vero. Quello era Simone, non io.

translation.en: But Simone is you. He's in there somewhere.
translation.it: Ma tu sei Simone. È da qualche parte dentro di te.

translation.en: You just have to find him, tout de suite.
translation.it: Devi solo trovarlo, tout de suite.

translation.en: Because Jeanette needs you, Simon.
translation.it: Perché Jeanette ha bisogno di te, Simon.

translation.en: No, I'm sorry, I just can't do it.
translation.it: No, mi dispiace, non ce la faccio.

translation.en: All right, Ian, get everyone to the raft.
translation.it: D'accordo, Ian, porta tutti sulla zattera.

translation.en: If the volcano blows before I make it out of here,
translation.it: Se il vulcano erutta prima che io torni,

translation.en: you have to promise me you'll...
Leave without you. Got it.
(SIGHS) Okay.
I'm coming with you.
Absolutely not, it's too dangerous.
Remember I said someday I may need to disobey you?
translation.it: Ricordi quando ho detto che un giorno avrei dovuto disubbidirti?

translation.en: Sorry, Dave, but I gotta disobey you.
translation.it: Mi dispiace, Dave, ma devo disubbidirti.

translation.en: Let's go.
You're not coming up until you have every last bit of that treasure.
translation.it: Ti tirerò su soltanto quando avrai recuperato il tesoro.

translation.en: But the volcano is about to explode!
translation.it: Ma il vulcano sta per eruttare!

translation.en: Well, then I guess you better hurry, huh?
translation.it: Allora sarà meglio che ti sbrighi!

translation.en: Run, go, go. In you go.
Get down there. That's right.
Keep going!
♪ S.O.S.
♪ Please someone help me
♪ It's not healthy for me to feel this
♪ Y.O.U. are
♪ Making it hard
♪ I can't help it See, it don't feel right
Keep moving!
♪ This time, please
♪ Someone come and rescue me ♪
Okay! Pull me up. I can't hold any more.
translation.it: D'accordo. Tirami su. Non posso prenderne di più.

translation.en: If you can still talk, it means you haven't stuffed your cheeks yet!
translation.it: Se riesci a parlare, significa che non ti sei riempita le guance!

translation.en: Yes! That sounds very good.
ALVIN: Dave!
They're supposed to be behind that waterfall!
translation.it: Devono essere dietro a quella cascata!

translation.en: That's right. That's what I'm talking about. (MUFFLED SPEECH)
ALVIN: Zoe! No, no. Not another step.
Don't come any closer.
Are you all right, Jeanette?
I'm pretty freaked out,
and those earrings tasted awful.
translation.it: e quegli orecchini avevano un gusto terribile.

translation.en: Zoe, you don't have to do this.
Oh, I don't? I spent 10 years looking for this treasure.
translation.it: Davvero? Sono 10 anni che cerco questo tesoro.

translation.en: It's the whole reason why I came to this stinking island!
translation.it: È per questo che sono venuta su quest'isola orrenda!

translation.en: You mean you didn't crash-land?
translation.it: Non c'è stato alcun incidente aereo?

translation.en: They said that I was crazy and they said that this map was a fake.
translation.it: Dicevano che ero pazza e che questa mappa era un falso.

translation.en: And now the treasure is mine!
translation.it: E ora il tesoro è mio!

translation.en: Run!
Jeanette, come on, come on.
Run!
(SQUEALS) ZOE: No, you don't!
translation.it: Tu non vai da nessuna parte!

translation.en: JEANETTE: Help, help!
Oh, no, help!
You're going back in that cave,
and you are going to get me more treasure.
Simone! It's Simon!
(DISTORTED) Alvin!
(DISTORTED) No!
DAVE: Come on, guys, go! Hurry!
Go, go!
Come on, come on.
Look!
Come on!
Run!
But where's Dave?
Help me up! Oh, help you up?
Is that what I'm supposed to do now, Dave?
All I had was my treasure, and now it's gone.
translation.it: Io avevo solo il mio tesoro e ora non c'è più.

translation.en: Do you get that? My life is ruined.
translation.it: Lo capisci? La mia vita è rovinata.

translation.en: And now you're gonna know how that feels.
translation.it: E ora anche tu saprai come ci si sente.

translation.en: IAN: It's tempting to blame Dave.
I know. I've been there.
translation.it: Lo so. Ci sono passato anch'io.

translation.en: I wish I could get back all those years I spent plotting my revenge.
translation.it: Vorrei poter recuperare tutti gli anni buttati per vendicarmi.

translation.en: All that time and energy, wasted.
translation.it: Tutto quel tempo e quell'energia sprecati.

translation.en: All those pizzas I had delivered to his house, wasted.
translation.it: Tutte quelle pizze mandate a casa sua.

translation.en: That was you?
Not now, Dave! All right?
You could let Dave fall to his death
and I could go back to the raft with the chipmunks,
translation.it: e io posso tornare dai Chipmunk,

translation.en: become their manager again and make tons of money.
translation.it: ridiventare loro manager e guadagnare soldi a palate.

translation.en: So, really, I'm good either way.
But let me tell you something.
Hate, anger, regret,
those aren't just members of a girl group I once signed.
translation.it: non è solo il nome di un gruppo che avevo ingaggiato.

translation.en: They're what consumed me. And they're consuming you.
translation.it: Sono cose che hanno consumato me e consumano anche te.

translation.en: It's not too late to do the right thing.
translation.it: Non è mai troppo tardi per fare la cosa giusta.

translation.en: Or not. Again,
I'm good either way, so...
translation.it: A me va bene comunque, quindi...

translation.en: I don't want to sway you.
What are you guys doing? Help me.
Please. Help me save my dad!
translation.it: Vi prego. Aiutatemi a salvare mio padre!

translation.en: Hurry!
I got you, Dave.
Come on! Help me, guys.
(BOTH GASP) Wow!
There they are!
SIMON: Come on!
Faster!
JEANETTE: Hurry! Hurry!
ALVIN: Let's go, go, go!
Hurry!
DAVE: Come on! Come on! ZOE: Come on!
BRITTANY: Run!
Grab the oar!
Come on! Come on, guys!
Paddle!
Come on! Paddle!
Faster! Come on, hurry!
Now we'll never get to perform at the International Music Awards.
translation.it: Non riusciremo mai a esibirci agli International Music Award.

translation.en: I guess now we're the losers.
Jeanette, I don't know what to say.
I guess I was just so obsessed with finding that treasure
translation.it: Ero così ossessionata dall'idea di trovare il tesoro,

translation.en: that I kind of... I lost it.
And I'm...
I'm really sorry.
We both are.
Well, apology accepted.
Here, I want you to have this. Oh.
Really?
Look, Dunlop, this is a new beginning
translation.it: Sai, Dunlop, questo è un nuovo inizio

translation.en: for both of us.
I hope you don't mind.
Simone gave it to me.
Oh, I don't mind.
You know, Jeanette, even the most perfect gem
translation.it: Sai, Jeanette, anche la gemma più preziosa

translation.en: cannot compare to your beauty.
translation.it: non è paragonabile alla tua bellezza.

translation.en: Dave? Yes, Alvin?
I just wanted to say
now that we're not all, you know, dead,
sorry.
Sorry.
Sorry I was acting like a child on the ship.
translation.it: Scusa se mi sono comportato da immaturo sulla nave.

translation.en: And kind of maybe ruined our family vacation.
translation.it: E se ho rovinato la vacanza di famiglia.

translation.en: Sometimes a racehorse needs a little room to run.
translation.it: A volte a un cavallo da corsa serve spazio per correre.

translation.en: Yes. Yeah. I like where your head's at.
translation.it: Già. Mi piace come la pensi.

translation.en: That is very wise, David.
IAN: 'Sup?
What, no love for Uncle Ian?
translation.it: Niente amore per lo zio Ian?

translation.en: You put us in cages! You put us in cages!
translation.it: -Tu ci hai messo in gabbia! -Tu ci hai messo in gabbia!

translation.en: Seriously? Are we still talking about that?
New subject, I saved Dave's life.
translation.it: Parliamo del fatto che ho salvato la vita di Dave.

translation.en: Okay, but I'll be watching you, mister.
Alvin, you still have that pocket knife I gave you?
translation.it: Alvin, hai ancora il coltellino che ti ho dato?

translation.en: Knife? Oh, right, sorry, I meant to give it back.
I want you to keep it.
Really?
Maybe you can use it to signal that helicopter. (WHIRRING)
translation.it: Forse potresti usarlo per fare segnali a quell'elicottero.

translation.en: What?
Hey! Down here!
Hello!
It's me, Ian Hawke! Jet Records!
translation.it: Sono io, Ian Hawke! Della Jet Records!

translation.en: DAVE: Guys, circle around!
MAN ON MEGAPHONE: Everything's okay. We got you, guys!
It's good to be back, huh?
Sure is.
Sold Zoe's story to Hollywood. Huge bidding war.
translation.it: Ho venduto la storia di Zoe a Hollywood. È piaciuta a tutti gli studi.

translation.en: Keira Knightley is interested.
I'm thinking Fiddy Cent for me.
translation.it: Io vorrei che mi interpretasse Fiddy Cent.

translation.en: Thank you!
Thank you! Thank you.
You're a great audience. We love you!
I'm sorry, sir, that's full.
translation.it: Mi dispiace, signore, ma è pieno.

translation.en: We're gonna have to gate-check those.
(SIGHS) Are you gonna charge me 25 bucks a bag?
translation.it: Vuole farmi pagare 25 dollari a borsa?

translation.en: Of course not, sir.
It's $25 for the first bag
and $40 for each additional bag.
translation.it: E 40 per ogni bagaglio in più.

translation.en: I'm a little chilly. Would you mind adjusting the vent?
translation.it: Ho un po' freddo. Potresti sistemare la bocchetta?

translation.en: But of course.
Oh! You wrinkled my business magazine. Sorry.
Guess I'll have to read this.
Ooh, she's pretty.
Oh, wait, that's me.
All right, head count.
You like my Jungle Monster costume? Eleanor made it for me.
translation.it: Ti piace il mio costume da mostro della giungla? L'ha fatto Eleanor.

translation.en: Yeah! Out of a barf bag!
translation.it: Già! Con un sacchetto per il vomito!

translation.en: Nice.
Where's Alvin?
ALVIN: Ladies and gentlemen, this is your captain speaking.
translation.it: Signore e signori, è il comandante che vi parla.

translation.en: We're cleared for an on-time departure for Timbuktu.
If Timbuktu is not for you,
please alert the flight attendant by pressing your call button.
translation.it: avvisate la hostess premendo il pulsante apposito.

translation.en: Thank you for choosing Air Alvin. Enjoy your flight!
translation.it: Grazie per aver scelto Air Alvin. Godetevi il volo!

translation.en: (CALL BUTTONS DINGING)
translation.it: Grazie per aver scelto Air Alvin. Godetevi il volo! Signore, si sieda. Stiamo per decollare.

translation.en: Sir, please return to your seat, we're about to take off.
translation.it: Signore, si sieda. Stiamo per decollare.
